AddressInfo.Title: Penrhiw Hotel
AddressInfo.AccessComments:
You can plan you journey by car using www.theaa.com/route-planner. Simply enter your postcode and ours, which is SA62 6PG to get your travel options or directions. 

The car park is located directly outside of Penrhiw Hotel and set in the private grounds of the property.

GeneralComments:
Penrhiw Hotel, offers luxury accommodation, fine dining at Blas Restaurant at our sister hotel, Twr y Felin, and is the perfect location to explore Pembrokeshire. Just a short walk to Whitesands beach and the cathedral, in Britainâ€™s smallest city, stay on a bed and breakfast basis or take exclusive use.

Complimentary transfers are available to and from Blas Restaurant at Twr y Felin each evening and luggage transfers are available for guests staying at either or our sister hotels, former windmill Twr y Felin, or 12th century Roch Castle.
  
Our rates are per room per night, based on two guests sharing and include VAT, parking and Wi-Fi. Book direct for a preferred rate.

Note: Due to its historic nature, Penrhiw is not suitable for guests with walking difficulties or children under 12 years. As a hypo-allergenic property, we cannot accept pets. 

www.penrhiwhotel.com
